turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like two pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: from your restaurant, Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like your pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what toppings would you like for your pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 large meat lovers pizzas, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $48, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes, and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
